ai.summary: A scenic 11.4 km loop around Great Lumley Village in the UK, offering a moderate hike through rural lanes and charming village scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly rural tarmac and compact country lanes with short stretches of gravel path and grassy verges. Expect gentle undulations and occasional uneven footing on older tracks.
ai.safety_notes: Carry a map or GPS; wear sturdy boots; stay on marked paths; be cautious of traffic on rural lanes; check weather and daylight hours; bring water and a small first aid kit.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for best weather and trail conditions; can be tackled in winter with appropriate warm clothing and footwear.
